Refund Policy

  • General Policy: At SARA, we do not charge any fee for education. Still, we strive to provide a fair and transparent refund process for our students. This policy outlines the circumstances under which refunds will be granted for tuition, fees, and other associated costs. Our goal is to ensure that students understand their financial obligations and the conditions under which they may be eligible for a refund.

  • Refunds will be processed within 30 days of receiving the completed request form and all required documentation. Refunds will be issued via the original payment method whenever possible.

  • Financial Aid and Scholarships: If the student received financial aid or scholarships, the refund amount might be adjusted based on the rules governing those funds.

  • This refund policy is subject to change without prior notice. Students are encouraged to review the policy regularly and consult the Registrar’s Office for the most current information.
